headline.main: Taiwan Says Meeting With China's Xi to Further Normalize Cross-Strait Ties
headline.print_headline: Taiwan Says Meeting With China's Xi to Further Normalize Cross-Strait Ties

docs.snippet: A weekend meeting between the leaders of Taiwan and China is aimed at further normalizing relations between the two sides, Taiwan President Ma Ying-jeou said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A weekend meeting between the leaders of Taiwan and China is aimed at further normalizing relations between the two sides, Taiwan President Ma Ying-jeou said on Thursday.

headline.main: California Ballot Initiative Would Require Porn Actors to Wear Condoms
headline.print_headline: California Ballot Initiative Would Require Porn Actors to Wear Condoms

docs.snippet: Actors in adult films in California would be required to wear condoms during explicit sex scenes under a referendum that qualified for the November 2016 ballot on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Actors in adult films in California would be required to wear condoms during explicit sex scenes under a referendum that qualified for the November 2016 ballot on Wednesday.

headline.main: Californians to Vote on Requiring Condoms in Porn Films
headline.print_headline: Californians to Vote on Requiring Condoms in Porn Films

docs.snippet: Californians are set to decide next year whether to require actors in pornographic movies to wear condoms, taking up an issue that could affect the future of the state's multibillion-dollar adult film industry....
docs.lead_paragraph: Californians are set to decide next year whether to require actors in pornographic movies to wear condoms, taking up an issue that could affect the future of the state's multibillion-dollar adult film industry.

headline.main: Iranian Military Hackers Focus on U.S. Administration Officials: WSJ
headline.print_headline: Iranian Military Hackers Focus on U.S. Administration Officials: WSJ

docs.snippet: Iran's Revolutionary Guards stepped up hacking of email and social media accounts of Obama administration officials in recent weeks in cyber attacks believed linked to the arrest of an Iranian-American businessman in Tehran, the Wall Street Journa...
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran's Revolutionary Guards stepped up hacking of email and social media accounts of Obama administration officials in recent weeks in cyber attacks believed linked to the arrest of an Iranian-American businessman in Tehran, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.

headline.main: U.S. Says Unclear if Taiwan-China Meeting Will Influence Taiwan Elections
headline.print_headline: U.S. Says Unclear if Taiwan-China Meeting Will Influence Taiwan Elections

docs.snippet: America's top diplomat for Asia said on Wednesday it was hard to see which Taiwanese political party would benefit most in January elections from a meeting this week between the country's leader and Chinese President Xi Jinping....
docs.lead_paragraph: America's top diplomat for Asia said on Wednesday it was hard to see which Taiwanese political party would benefit most in January elections from a meeting this week between the country's leader and Chinese President Xi Jinping.

headline.main: Oregon School Pumpkin Carving Party Suspected in Norovirus Outbreak
headline.print_headline: Oregon School Pumpkin Carving Party Suspected in Norovirus Outbreak

docs.snippet: A pre-Halloween pumpkin carving party may have caused a norovirus outbreak that has sickened more than 100 students, teachers and staff at an Oregon Catholic school, a public health official said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A pre-Halloween pumpkin carving party may have caused a norovirus outbreak that has sickened more than 100 students, teachers and staff at an Oregon Catholic school, a public health official said on Wednesday.
